0101110000101111 0111001001001000 1 -> sum: 1100111001111000, cout: 0
0100000010000011 0000010001100110 1 -> sum: 0100010011101010, cout: 0
1100011110000100 0001100010010111 1 -> sum: 1110000000011100, cout: 0

0100011101011101 1011011111011001 1 -> sum: 1111111100110111, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
